attributes.action: To define marriage as who ever wishes to marry, with no law on who shall marry.
attributes.background: To allow any who wishes to be married, there should be no rights on who shall marry, and any and all lovers/sexuality shall be allowed to marry.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure whether you would like all restrictions on marriage - such as laws against being married to more than one person, or marrying family members - to be removed, or whether you would just like the existing law on marriage not to be changed. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/186376
